attributes.action: Great Britain needs a Prime Minister a lot sooner than October.
attributes.additional_details: Along with the whole of the UK, our industries, banking, insurance and the EU is in limbo which is bad for industry and investment.
attributes.background: Regardless whether you voted Remain or Leave, Great Britain needs a Prime Minister a lot sooner than October. We call upon the Conservative Party to get the process of electing a new leader as soon as possible. The whole country is in limbo with the EU.
